mapper.select: SELECT h.asset_holder_id as id, h.asset_holder_name as name, h.asset_holder_email as email, h.asset_holder_phone as phone, h.asset_holder_address_id as addressId, h.asset_holder_contact_preferences_id as contactPreferencesId, h.asset_holder_last_modified as lastModified, ${function}(a.asset_id) AS accumulation FROM asset_holders h LEFT JOIN assets a ON h.asset_holder_id = a.asset_owner_id GROUP BY h.asset_holder_id, h.asset_holder_name, h.asset_holder_email, h.asset_holder_phone, h.asset_holder_address_id, h.asset_holder_contact_preferences_id, h.asset_holder_last_modified ORDER BY h.asset_holder_id;
mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_password, user_asset_holder_id, user_is_admin) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{assetHolderId}, #{admin});
mapper.delete: delete from users where user_asset_holder_id in #{id}
delete from users where user_id in #{id}
